title: Simple Past vs. Pres. Perf. vs. Past Prog.

instruction.title: Color
instruction.text: In the text, VIEW shows you the gerunds Vb-ing.

instruction.title: Click
instruction.text: Click on each gerund you find in the text and VIEW will show you whether you guessed right or wrong.

instruction.title: Multiple Choice
instruction.text: Choose an gerund from the drop-down list and VIEW will show you whether you guessed right or wrong. You can get help by clicking on ?.

instruction.title: Fill in the blanks
instruction.text: Fill in the blanks with the correct verb form in the simple past, present perfect, or past progressive. If you guessed wrong or you find it too difficult you can get help by clicking on ?.
